channel.title: Swearing
channel.description: Hello, i was wondering if someone could help me take off the swearing system. Like when someones swears it blocks it off on my server. Can someone help me take that off?

item.title: Swearing
item.dc:creator: @Skaternerd7 Skaternerd7
item.description:
@Skaternerd7 wrote:

i have this same problem and I search the bad word, find it, delete it, and when i compile it just comes back…I can’t even make sence out of these class files. how am i suppose to read this?
